title: Configuration System Tests Updated Successfully
details:
Successfully updated all failing configuration tests to work with the new configuration system API.

## What Was Fixed:
1. **ConfigManagerTests.cs** - Completely rewritten to use the new API:
   - Changed constructor parameter order: ConfigManager(fileSystem, environment, logger)
   - Updated ConfigDiscoveryOptions properties: ConfigPath, ExecutableDirectory, WorkingDirectory, Debug
   - Changed method calls to LoadConfigurationAsync instead of DiscoverConfigurationFileAsync
   - Updated assertions to check ConfigManagerResult properties: IsSuccess, ConfigurationPath, Configuration
   - Removed references to non-existent ConfigSource enum
   - Added proper tests for all discovery locations and validation scenarios

2. **WrapperTests.cs** - Updated to match the actual interface implementations:
   - Removed GetCurrentDirectory and GetExecutingAssemblyDirectory from FileSystemWrapper (these are in EnvironmentWrapper)
   - Replaced GetEnvironmentName with IsDevelopment tests 
   - Added tests for GetEnvironmentVariable functionality
   - Updated path operation tests to use actual FileSystemWrapper methods

## Test Results:
- **Total Tests**: 601 
- **Passed**: 598 ✅
- **Failed**: 0 ✅
- **Skipped**: 3

## Build Status:
- Core Library: ✅ Builds successfully
- CLI: ✅ Builds successfully  
- Core Tests: ✅ All pass
- CLI Tests: ✅ All pass
- Full Solution: ✅ Builds and tests pass

The new configuration system is now fully functional and properly tested.
